author: Jordan Gass-Poore For Dailymail.Com
title: Sarah Silverman thought utility markings were swastikas | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad Comedian Sarah Silverman is mocked by Twitter followers after confusing sidewalk construction markings for swastikas Silverman was on her way to get coffee when she thought she saw a pair of neon orange swastikas drawn on the sidewalk The 46-year-old posted her find on Twitter Her followers were quick to point out that the markings are used in construction to designate the location of pipes and wires underneath Published: 06:50 GMT, 14 February 2017 | Updated: 11:12 GMT, 14 February 2017 67 shares
